Objective: Verify way to navigate to specials page from footer link
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps: 1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Specials page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Specials page

Objective: Verify only the products whose prices are reduced appear in specials page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps: 1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
Expected Result: The products listed should have prices reduced than original price
Actual Result: The products listed should has prices reduced than original price

Objective: Verify sorting the products in specials page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click sort by dropdown and select an option
3) Repeat step 2 for all dropdown options
Expected Result: The products should be sorted according to selected sort option
Actual Result: The products are sorted according to selected sort option

Objective: Verify arranging the products in list and grid in specials page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click List (ER-01)
3) Click Grid (ER-02)
Expected Result:
1) The products should be arranged in List format
2) The products should be  arranged in Grid format
Actual Result:
1) The products are arranged in List format
2) The products are arranged in Grid format

Objective: Verify the show number of listings functionality
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click the dropdown in Show section and select an option
Expected Result: The number of Product listings should be listed properly according to the selected option

Objective: Verify the product compare button functionality
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click Product compare button
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Product compare page
Actual Result: The User is taken to Product compare page

Objective: Verify adding to cart from Specials page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click add to cart button in any product
Expected Result: The product should be added to cart and success message should be shown
Actual Result: The product is added to cart and success message is shown

Objective: Verify adding to WishList from Specials page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click add to Wishlist button in any product
Expected Result: The product should be added to Wish List and success message should be shown
Actual Result: The product is added to Wish List and success message is shown

Objective: Verify adding to Product compare from Specials page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click add to Product compare button in any product
Expected Result: The product should be added to product compare page and success message should be shown
Actual Result: The product is added to product compare page and success message is shown

Objective: Verify going to product page from specials by clicking product name
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click a product name
Expected Result: The User should be taken to the product page of clicked product
Actual Result: The User is taken to the product page of clicked product

Objective: Verify going to product page from specials by clicking product image
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Click a product image
Expected Result: The User should be taken to the product page of clicked product
Actual Result: The User is taken to the product page of clicked product

Objective: Verify the breadcrumb of specials page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps: 1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
Expected Result: The breadcrumb should be displayed and working
Actual Result: The breadcrumb is displayed and working

Objective: Verify the Specials Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click the Specials in footer under extras label
2) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Specials Page should work in all supported environments
Actual Result: The Specials Page works in all supported environments
